name: Doin' Time (Canceled)
blurb: A game about surviving prison life!  What could be more fun then learning proper prison etiquette and crafting weapons!

rewards.reward: You will receive a special email from us thanking you for your involvement and you will be subscribed to the monthly newsletter.

You will get a free copy of the completed game and access to the beta as well as a small monthly allowance of stamps for use in the game as well as updates on the game\u2019s development from the development team via email and access to the developer\u2019s cam site to watch all the antics associated with game\u2019s development.  Plus all lower reward tiers!

You will get an even larger monthly allowance of stamps for use in the game, a permanent in game item that allows you to blackmail a guard, and exclusive access to the game\u2019s development discussion board. Plus all lower reward tiers!

You will receive an inmate shirt with the \u201cDoin\u2019 Time\u201d logo, a digital game card pack as well as an even larger monthly allowance of stamps to spend in the game, and a permanent shiv in game item. Plus all lower reward tiers!

You will receive a hard copy of the Rightsville Prison Handbook, A Commissary List, a mention of your name in the game\u2019s credits, we will use your name or allow you to name an NPC in the game, and a Doin\u2019 Time Poster ruined by the signatures and personalized comments of the team written in prison in (blood), and monthly conjugal visitation from that special someone to smuggle in contraband items for use in game. Plus all lower reward tiers!

You will receive authentic DOC shower shoes, a special mention in the game\u2019s credits, permanent unique in game item that is only available to those who pledge at this level (cannot be sold or traded), participation in our monthly development round table sessions, and original signed artwork from a Prisoner that our artists create based off of you! Plus all lower reward tiers!

You will receive an official personalized Rightsville Prison Jumpsuit, Soap on a rope (the rope helps you to not drop it), access to daily prison statistics on inmate population, and an original game art grab bag. You will also receive a permanent position on the prison disciplinary board where you will help to decide on punishments for other players charged with major infractions. Plus all lower reward tiers!

We will fly you to Atlanta and get you involved in the creative process of an NPC as well as related dialog, goof off, and generally burn your pledge money (we will also give you the original artwork from this NPC that you helped create)! Plus all lower reward tiers!
